Plot: Laura Henderson buys an old London theater and opens it up as the Windmill, a performance hall which goes down in history for, among other things, its all-nude revues.
Title: Mrs Henderson Presents
Writer: David Rose (idea), Kathy Rose (idea), Martin Sherman, Sheila van Damm (book)
Actors: Judi Dench, Bob Hoskins, Will Young, Christopher Guest
tomatoConsensus: Judi Dench and Bob Hoskins shine in this warm, witty period piece.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 6 wins & 31 nominations.
